content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #150

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Update sentence in open-imaging-study, switch-imaging-study and close-imaging-study

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Event Catalog (open-imaging-study, switch-imaging-study, close-imaging-study)
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Correction

Summary: Update sentence in open-imaging-study, switch-imaging-study and close-imaging-study

Comment: Update sentence: "FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose chart is currently in context." to "FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose study is currently in context.

Existing wording: FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose chart is currently in context.
Proposed wording: FHIR Patient resource describing the patient whose study is currently in context.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #150:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
